meanings.definition: A dish of Italian origin consisting of a flat, round base of dough baked with a topping of tomato sauce and cheese, typically with added meat or vegetables.
meanings.sent1: We ordered two pizzas for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: The smell of freshly baked pizzas filled the room.
meanings.sent3: The pizzas at the party disappeared faster than the speed of light!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as cheesy and warm as a pizza straight out of the oven.
meanings.sent5: The pizzas were like edible happiness topped with joy.

meanings.definition: A round flat bread base with a topping of tomato sauce, cheese, and other ingredients, baked in an oven.
meanings.sent1: The kids enjoyed making their own mini pizzas during the cooking class.
meanings.sent2: The pizzeria offered a variety of pizzas on their menu.
meanings.sent3: The pizza toppings danced on the dough like a delicious parade.
meanings.sent4: His ideas were like different pizza toppings, each adding a unique flavor to the project.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of pizzas baking in the oven was irresistible.
